title: Enhancing SeeGround with Relational Depth Text for 3D Visual Grounding

description.title: Abstract
description.contents: Visual grounding is a critical task in computer vision, involving the localization of objects within an image based on natural language queries. In this paper, we propose a novel approach to enhance 3D visual grounding by incorporating relational depth text information.

title: UniAD 모델 경량화 및 성능 비교 (Lightweight UniAD)

description.title: Overview
description.contents: A study on lightweighting the Unified Autonomous Driving (UniAD) model while maintaining performance. Published in ICROS 2025.

title: ViewFormer 기반 다중 시점 3D 점유 인지 성능 향상을 위한 객체 마스크 모듈

description.title: Overview
description.contents: Object Mask Module for Enhancing Multi-View 3D Occupancy Perception Performance Based on ViewFormer. Published in ICROS 2025.
